name: idb-in-worker-perf
description: indexedDB performance in main-thread vs web-worker thread
author: rooparam <roopchou@microsoft.com>

scripts.build: yarn run buildWorker && yarn run buildMain
scripts.dev: start yarn run watchMain && start yarn run watchWorker && yarn run http-server
scripts.serve: yarn run build && browserify --entry dist\main-thread\thread.js -o dist\main-bundle.js && yarn run http-server
